@redneck97 wrote:

ok im stuck using How To Make NPC’s Drop Randoms (noob language) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,104200.0.html
but here is where im stuck

Step 4: Open item3.java, and scroll down to the bottom. Before the last }, press enter and copy this, and paste it. But remember the name you put in Code:[code] Item3.randomITEM3NAME() [/code] because it needs to call upon the same name or you will get errors.

Code: public static int ANY NAME YOU WANT[] = {ID'S OF THE ITEM'S}; public static int randomANY NAME YOU WANT() { return ANY NAME YOU WANT[(int)(Math.random()*ANY NAME YOU WANT.length)]; }

my compiler sayes that the Item3.randomITEM3NAME() is wrongsayes a identifer is expected at the ()
